name: My House - Home Design Games
description:
Did you ever dream to design and decorate your own house? Did you ever want to know what it feels like to run your own interior design studio? Now you can design houses with My House - Home Design Games! Dreams come true in this home decorating puzzle game.

Become a home makeover and interior designer solve match 3 puzzle levels and unlock hundreds of new decor items to help your clients create their dream home!

What Makes My House - Home Design Games so addictive? Well, for starters, that's what you'll be doing in the game:

-Various decorations & furniture to collect;
-Home design simulation with match 3 puzzle challenges;
-Choose the best art objects and home decor elements for your dream house;
-Meet fascinating characters and follow the story development;
-Over 1000 challenging puzzles in this decoration design world!

Let’s have fun in the house design world！
